scenario.name: CER-CEA
scenario.send_diameter:
<CER> : < Diameter Header: 257, REQ>
      Origin-Host(264, M, 0, OctetString):"[$componentName].[originhost]"
      Origin-Realm(296, M, 0, OctetString):"[$componentName].[originrealm]"
      Host-IP-Address(257, M, 0, Address):"[local_ip]"
      Vendor-Id(266, M, 0, Integer32):"10415"
      Product-Name(269, , 0, OctetString):"Netas [$componentName]"
      Supported-Vendor-Id(265, M, 0, Integer32):"10415"
      Vendor-Specific-Application-Id(260, M, 0, Grouped):{
         Vendor-Id(266, M, 0, Integer32):"10415"
         Auth-Application-Id(258, M, 0, Integer32):"16777264"
      }
      Vendor-Specific-Application-Id(260, M, 0, Grouped):{
         Vendor-Id(266, M, 0, Integer32):"10415"
         Auth-Application-Id(258, M, 0, Integer32):"16777250"
      }
      Vendor-Specific-Application-Id(260, M, 0, Grouped):{
         Vendor-Id(266, M, 0, Integer32):"10415"
         Auth-Application-Id(258, M, 0, Integer32):"16777272"
      }
      Firmware-Revision(267, , 0, Unsigned32):"1"
